name: Conversions
func:
msg.data.main.temp = ((msg.data.main.temp - 273.15) * 1.8) + 32
msg.data.main.feels_like = ((msg.data.main.feels_like - 273.15) * 1.8) + 32
msg.data.main.temp_min = ((msg.data.main.temp_min - 273.15) * 1.8) + 32
msg.data.main.temp_max = ((msg.data.main.temp_max - 273.15) * 1.8) + 32
msg.data.main.pressure = msg.data.main.pressure * 0.029529983071445
msg.data.wind.speed = msg.data.wind.speed * 2.237
msg.data.wind.gust = msg.data.wind.gust * 2.237
return msg;

name: Rounding
func:
var temp = msg.data.main.temp
var feels_like = msg.data.main.feels_like
var temp_min = msg.data.main.temp_min
var temp_max = msg.data.main.temp_max
var pressure = msg.data.main.pressure
var windspeed = msg.data.wind.speed
var windgust = msg.data.wind.gust

msg.data.main.temp = +temp.toFixed(1)
msg.data.main.feels_like = +feels_like.toFixed(1)
msg.data.main.temp_min = +temp_min.toFixed(1)
msg.data.main.temp_max = +temp_max.toFixed(1)
msg.data.main.pressure = +pressure.toFixed(2)
msg.data.wind.speed = +windspeed.toFixed(2)
msg.data.wind.gust = +windgust.toFixed(2)

return msg;

name: Notify Basement TV
data: {	    "title": msg.topic,	    "message": msg.payload,	    "data": {	        fontsize: "large",	        duration: 3,	        transparency: "30%",	        color: "indigo"	    }	}

rules.to: You are done reading for today!
Lights on after delay due to clear weather
Lights on early due to cloudy weather
Lights not on due to nobody home, or toggle shutoff
